document.discussion_title: These spring gardening tips will make your lawn gorgeous for summer
document.topic_text: These spring gardening tips will make your lawn gorgeous for summer Treat your lawn this spring to create a beautiful summer yard. Here are a few tips to get your yard ready for a trim: Comment SJ News Online - St. John, KS By Inform Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 12:30 PM By Inform Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 12:30 PM Treat your lawn this spring to create a beautiful summer yard. Here are a few tips to get your yard ready for a trim: Sharpen lawnmower blades Check tools for broken handles Trim all bushes Watch for more spring season garden lawn care: By Inform SJ News Online - St. John, KS By Inform
